Sect.P: MIDI dump: closed loop connection This allows unit B to acknowledge each package as it arrives. This is faster and safer than the open loop method.
MIDI Dump: transfer with closed loop This gives the receiving unit B an opportunity to check each incoming packet and ask for a retransmit if necessary.
